00020     public function rules()
00021     {
00022         return array_merge(parent::rules(), array(
00023             array('tablePrefix, databaseComponent, baseClass, tableName, modelClass, modelPath', 'filter', 'filter'=>'trim'),
00024             array('tableName, databaseComponent, modelPath, baseClass', 'required'),
00025             array('tablePrefix, databaseComponent, tableName, modelPath', 'match', 'pattern'=>'/^(\w+[\w\.]*|\*?|\w+\.\*)$/', 'message'=>'{attribute} should only contain word characters, dots, and an optional ending asterisk.'),
00026             array('tableName', 'validateTableName', 'skipOnError'=>true),
00027             array('tablePrefix, modelClass, baseClass', 'match', 'pattern'=>'/^\w+$/', 'message'=>'{attribute} should only contain word characters.'),
00028             array('modelPath', 'validateModelPath', 'skipOnError'=>true),
00029             array('baseClass', 'validateBaseClass', 'skipOnError'=>true),
00030             array('tablePrefix, modelPath, baseClass', 'sticky'),
00031         ));
00032     }

00053     public function init()
00054     {
00055         if(Yii::app()->getComponent($this->databaseComponent)===null)
00056             throw new CHttpException(500,'An active database ("db") connection is required to run this generator.');
00057         $this->tablePrefix=Yii::app()->getComponent($this->databaseComponent)->tablePrefix;
00058         parent::init();
00059     }

00061     public function prepare()
00062     {
00063         $this->files=array();
00064         $templatePath=$this->templatePath;
00065 
00066         if(($pos=strrpos($this->tableName,'.'))!==false)
00067         {
00068             $schema=substr($this->tableName,0,$pos);
00069             $tableName=substr($this->tableName,$pos+1);
00070         }
00071         else
00072         {
00073             $schema='';
00074             $tableName=$this->tableName;
00075         }
00076         if($tableName[strlen($tableName)-1]==='*')
00077         {
00078             $tables=Yii::app()->getComponent($this->databaseComponent)->schema->getTables($schema);
00079             if($this->tablePrefix!='')
00080             {
00081                 foreach($tables as $i=>$table)
00082                 {
00083                     if(strpos($table->name,$this->tablePrefix)!==0)
00084                         unset($tables[$i]);
00085                 }
00086             }
00087         }
00088         else
00089             $tables=array($this->getTableSchema($this->tableName));
00090 
00091         $this->relations=$this->generateRelations();
00092 
00093         foreach($tables as $table)
00094         {
00095             $tableName=$this->removePrefix($table->name);
00096             $className=$this->generateClassName($table->name);
00097             $params=array(
00098                 'tableName'=>$schema==='' ? $tableName : $schema.'.'.$tableName,
00099                 'modelClass'=>$className,
00100                 'columns'=>$table->columns,
00101                 'labels'=>$this->generateLabels($table),
00102                 'rules'=>$this->generateRules($table),
00103                 'relations'=>isset($this->relations[$className]) ? $this->relations[$className] : array(),
00104             );
00105             $this->files[]=new CCodeFile(
00106                 Yii::getPathOfAlias($this->modelPath).'/'.$className.'.php',
00107                 $this->render($templatePath.'/model.php', $params)
00108             );
00109         }
00110     }

00112     public function validateTableName($attribute,$params)
00113     {
00114         if($this->tableName!='' && $this->tableName[strlen($this->tableName)-1]==='*')
00115             $this->modelClass='';
00116         else
00117         {
00118             if($this->getTableSchema($this->tableName)===null)
00119                 $this->addError('tableName',"Table '{$this->tableName}' does not exist.");
00120             if($this->modelClass==='')
00121                 $this->addError('modelClass','Model Class cannot be blank.');
00122         }
00123     }

00125     public function validateModelPath($attribute,$params)
00126     {
00127         if(Yii::getPathOfAlias($this->modelPath)===false)
00128             $this->addError('modelPath','Model Path must be a valid path alias.');
00129     }

00131     public function validateBaseClass($attribute,$params)
00132     {
00133         $class=@Yii::import($this->baseClass,true);
00134         if(!is_string($class) || !$this->classExists($class))
00135             $this->addError('baseClass', "Class '{$this->baseClass}' does not exist or has syntax error.");
00136         else if($class!=='CActiveRecord' && !is_subclass_of($class,'CActiveRecord'))
00137             $this->addError('baseClass', "'{$this->model}' must extend from CActiveRecord.");
00138     }

00140     public function getTableSchema($tableName)
00141     {
00142         return Yii::app()->getComponent($this->databaseComponent)->getSchema()->getTable($tableName);

00145     public function generateLabels($table)
00146     {
00147         $labels=array();
00148         foreach($table->columns as $column)
00149         {
00150             $label=ucwords(trim(strtolower(str_replace(array('-','_'),' ',preg_replace('/(?<![A-Z])[A-Z]/', ' \0', $column->name)))));
00151             $label=preg_replace('/\s+/',' ',$label);
00152             if(strcasecmp(substr($label,-3),' id')===0)
00153                 $label=substr($label,0,-3);
00154             if($label==='Id')
00155                 $label='ID';
00156             $labels[$column->name]=$label;
00157         }
00158         return $labels;
00159     }

00161     public function generateRules($table)
00162     {
00163         $rules=array();
00164         $required=array();
00165         $integers=array();
00166         $numerical=array();
00167         $length=array();
00168         $safe=array();
00169         foreach($table->columns as $column)
00170         {
00171             if($column->isPrimaryKey && $table->sequenceName!==null)
00172                 continue;
00173             $r=!$column->allowNull && $column->defaultValue===null;
00174             if($r)
00175                 $required[]=$column->name;
00176             if($column->type==='integer')
00177                 $integers[]=$column->name;
00178             else if($column->type==='double')
00179                 $numerical[]=$column->name;
00180             else if($column->type==='string' && $column->size>0)
00181                 $length[$column->size][]=$column->name;
00182             else if(!$column->isPrimaryKey && !$r)
00183                 $safe[]=$column->name;
00184         }
00185         if($required!==array())
00186             $rules[]="array('".implode(', ',$required)."', 'required')";
00187         if($integers!==array())
00188             $rules[]="array('".implode(', ',$integers)."', 'numerical', 'integerOnly'=>true)";
00189         if($numerical!==array())
00190             $rules[]="array('".implode(', ',$numerical)."', 'numerical')";
00191         if($length!==array())
00192         {
00193             foreach($length as $len=>$cols)
00194                 $rules[]="array('".implode(', ',$cols)."', 'length', 'max'=>$len)";
00195         }
00196         if($safe!==array())
00197             $rules[]="array('".implode(', ',$safe)."', 'safe')";
00198 
00199         return $rules;
00200     }

00202     public function getRelations($className)
00203     {
00204         return isset($this->relations[$className]) ? $this->relations[$className] : array();
00205     }

00207     protected function removePrefix($tableName,$addBrackets=true)
00208     {
00209         if($addBrackets && Yii::app()->getComponent($this->databaseComponent)->tablePrefix=='')
00210             return $tableName;
00211         $prefix=$this->tablePrefix!='' ? $this->tablePrefix : Yii::app()->getComponent($this->databaseComponent)->tablePrefix;
00212         if($prefix!='')
00213         {
00214             if($addBrackets && Yii::app()->getComponent($this->databaseComponent)->tablePrefix!='')
00215             {
00216                 $prefix=Yii::app()->getComponent($this->databaseComponent)->tablePrefix;
00217                 $lb='{{';
00218                 $rb='}}';
00219             }
00220             else
00221                 $lb=$rb='';
00222             if(($pos=strrpos($tableName,'.'))!==false)
00223             {
00224                 $schema=substr($tableName,0,$pos);
00225                 $name=substr($tableName,$pos+1);
00226                 if(strpos($name,$prefix)===0)
00227                     return $schema.'.'.$lb.substr($name,strlen($prefix)).$rb;
00228             }
00229             else if(strpos($tableName,$prefix)===0)
00230                 return $lb.substr($tableName,strlen($prefix)).$rb;
00231         }
00232         return $tableName;
00233     }
00234 
00235     protected function generateRelations()
00236     {
00237         $relations=array();
00238         foreach(Yii::app()->getComponent($this->databaseComponent)->schema->getTables() as $table)
00239         {
00240             if($this->tablePrefix!='' && strpos($table->name,$this->tablePrefix)!==0)
00241                 continue;
00242             $tableName=$table->name;
00243 
00244             if ($this->isRelationTable($table))
00245             {
00246                 $pks=$table->primaryKey;
00247                 $fks=$table->foreignKeys;
00248 
00249                 $table0=$fks[$pks[0]][0];
00250                 $table1=$fks[$pks[1]][0];
00251                 $className0=$this->generateClassName($table0);
00252                 $className1=$this->generateClassName($table1);
00253 
00254                 $unprefixedTableName=$this->removePrefix($tableName);
00255 
00256                 $relationName=$this->generateRelationName($table0, $table1, true);
00257                 $relations[$className0][$relationName]="array(self::MANY_MANY, '$className1', '$unprefixedTableName($pks[0], $pks[1])')";
00258 
00259                 $relationName=$this->generateRelationName($table1, $table0, true);
00260                 $relations[$className1][$relationName]="array(self::MANY_MANY, '$className0', '$unprefixedTableName($pks[1], $pks[0])')";
00261             }
00262             else
00263             {
00264                 $className=$this->generateClassName($tableName);
00265                 foreach ($table->foreignKeys as $fkName => $fkEntry)
00266                 {
00267                     // Put table and key name in variables for easier reading
00268                     $refTable=$fkEntry[0]; // Table name that current fk references to
00269                     $refKey=$fkEntry[1];   // Key in that table being referenced
00270                     $refClassName=$this->generateClassName($refTable);
00271 
00272                     // Add relation for this table
00273                     $relationName=$this->generateRelationName($tableName, $fkName, false);
00274                     $relations[$className][$relationName]="array(self::BELONGS_TO, '$refClassName', '$fkName')";
00275 
00276                     // Add relation for the referenced table
00277                     $relationType=$table->primaryKey === $fkName ? 'HAS_ONE' : 'HAS_MANY';
00278                     $relationName=$this->generateRelationName($refTable, $this->removePrefix($tableName,false), $relationType==='HAS_MANY');
00279                     $relations[$refClassName][$relationName]="array(self::$relationType, '$className', '$fkName')";
00280                 }
00281             }
00282         }
00283         return $relations;
00284     }
00285 
00292     protected function isRelationTable($table)
00293     {
00294         $pk=$table->primaryKey;
00295         return (count($pk) === 2 // we want 2 columns
00296             && isset($table->foreignKeys[$pk[0]]) // pk column 1 is also a foreign key
00297             && isset($table->foreignKeys[$pk[1]]) // pk column 2 is also a foriegn key
00298             && $table->foreignKeys[$pk[0]][0] !== $table->foreignKeys[$pk[1]][0]); // and the foreign keys point different tables
00299     }
00300 
00301     protected function generateClassName($tableName)
00302     {
00303         if($this->tableName===$tableName || ($pos=strrpos($this->tableName,'.'))!==false && substr($this->tableName,$pos+1)===$tableName)
00304             return $this->modelClass;
00305 
00306         $tableName=$this->removePrefix($tableName,false);
00307         $className='';
00308         foreach(explode('_',$tableName) as $name)
00309         {
00310             if($name!=='')
00311                 $className.=ucfirst($name);
00312         }
00313         return $className;
00314     }
00315 
00323     protected function generateRelationName($tableName, $fkName, $multiple)
00324     {
00325         if(strcasecmp(substr($fkName,-2),'id')===0 && strcasecmp($fkName,'id'))
00326             $relationName=rtrim(substr($fkName, 0, -2),'_');
00327         else
00328             $relationName=$fkName;
00329         $relationName[0]=strtolower($relationName);
00330 
00331         $rawName=$relationName;
00332         if($multiple)
00333             $relationName=$this->pluralize($relationName);
00334 
00335         $table=Yii::app()->getComponent($this->databaseComponent)->schema->getTable($tableName);
00336         $i=0;
00337         while(isset($table->columns[$relationName]))
00338             $relationName=$rawName.($i++);
00339 
00340         $names=preg_split('/_+/',$relationName,-1,PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
00341         if(empty($names)) return $relationName;  // unlikely
00342         for($name=$names[0], $i=1;$i<count($names);++$i)
00343             $name.=ucfirst($names[$i]);
00344         return $name;
00345     }
